fields.description:
Description:
1.Create the default app for BB in studio
2.Build & run on BB 10.1 beta simulator

Actual Result:
1.We do not see any appcelerator splash screen

Expected Result:
1.We should see the appcelerator splash screen
fields.summary: BlackBerry 10.1 Beta : Appcelerator splash screen does not show up on app launch
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201302041831
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130205102610
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
BB simulator : 10.1.0.338

comments.body:
Workaround is to create a file called: splash-600x1024.png

This is placed in the Resources/blackberry directory - the image needs to conform to those dimensions, then the splash screen loads. Not sure if this changes with the current SDK though.

Verified the fix. Now we can see the splash screen.Thus closing.
